NORTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
ITALY.
FIVE METER VESSEL, BEIGE HULL, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED FROM RAVENNA (44-25N 012-12E) AT
150530Z JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3 906 592 4145, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 3 906 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT, ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
